aircraft.value: Phoenix Recon - AC-6231-222 at Base Bravo

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 14/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 17/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 15/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 17/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 22/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
